content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0) refueled with coal, extracting iron ore.
- Two Stone Furnaces:
  - Furnace at position (x=-12.0, y=-48.0) producing iron plates.
  - Furnace at position (x=-10.0, y=-48.0) producing iron plates.
- Inserters:
  - Burner Inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-48.5) transferring materials between entities.
  - Burner Inserter at position (x=-8.5, y=-47.5) waiting for space in destination.
- Chests:
  - Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5) for storage.
  - Wooden Chest at position (x=-15.5, y=-48.5) for storage.
  - Wooden Chest at position (x=-6.5, y=-48.5) for storing iron plates.
  - Wooden Chest at position (x=-7.5, y=-47.5) for storage.
  - Wooden Chest at position (x=-6.5, y=-47.5) for storing iron plates.
  - Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-46.5) for storing iron ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Space
- Ensure that the destination of the inserter has enough space to receive items. Consider using additional storage or managing inventory more effectively.

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity. For example, attempting to place a wooden chest without having one in inventory will result in an error. 

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source from which the inserter is picking up items has enough materials available. Regularly check and refill the source inventory to prevent delays in production.
